snippet.title: Tales of Ancients - Reveal Teaser (EN)
snippet.description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2836090/Tales_of_Ancients/

Echoes of the Forgotten Town: The Secrets of Nox Aeterna

Game Description
This once peaceful and tranquil town... now lost in the shadow of silence and abandonment. The story of a man lost amidst the whispers of rain and the fears hidden by the mist... Alex.

Story
Alex's ordinary journey turned into a descent into the unknown when his car broke down. After discovering the mysterious tunnels of an ancient temple complex deep in the forest, he found himself in this abandoned town. Now, he must bring not only his curiosity but also his struggle for survival here.

While wandering the streets of the town, he discovered an old book in an abandoned bookstore. The book contained secrets of ancient civilizations and cults. As he followed the traces of the mysterious Nox Aeterna cult, each page drew him deeper. Every corner of this town is a puzzle, every shadow a trap.

Gameplay
Exploration and Puzzle Solving: Explore the abandoned streets, apartment buildings, and underground tunnels. Solve puzzles to uncover the secrets of the Nox Aeterna cult.
Atmospheric Tension: In a world filled with dense fog, constant rain, and nighttime, distinguishing between reality and nightmare will be a challenge.
Story-Driven Experience: Discover the dark history of the town and the mysteries of the cult through rich storytelling. Every clue will draw you deeper.

Features

Deep Story: Uncover the secrets of ancient civilizations and the dark past of the Nox Aeterna cult.
Atmospheric Graphics: Experience the eerie atmosphere of the town, dominated by dense fog and rain.
Thrilling Gameplay: Survive in a world filled with danger and mysteries around every corner.

Do You Dare?
Do you dare to accompany Alex on this journey filled with darkness and danger? Are you ready to discover the truths lurking behind the mist and rain?

The secrets of the town await you...
